name: ScanComponentsPCB
tagline: Test-bed SmoothieBoard Electronic Test. This application permit to test if missing components on the SmoothieBoard electronic card.
body: ### Welcome to ScanComponentsPCB Pages. ## What is ScanComponentsPCB ? Scan Components PCB is software available on Linux 32-bit/64-bit or Windows 32-bit/64-bit (it is also available on MacOS and Android: see below) programmed with Processing in Java, which can detect possible missing components on a electronic card. The project consists of a data-computer part and a mechanical part. Computer part contains a database in which there is all the coordinates of 307 components of the SmoothieBoard card in millimeter. The mechanical part includes SolidWorks plans for the construction of the test-bed, which can be made with wood and magnets for adjusting the webcam : ![Test-bed prototype](http://www.freeimagehosting.net/">
